Said Tarabeek (Arabic; April 17, 1941 -November 15, 2015) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn na elu nkwago
A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe ọ na-arịa ọrịa obi, nke mechara duga na nkụchi obi na ọnwụ ya.

Ihe nkiri Tarabeek gụnyere Ragol Faqad Aqloh (A Man Who Lost his Mind, 1980) Salam Ya Sahby (Goodbye my Friend, 1986), Bakhit we Adila (1995), Omaret Yacoubian (The Yacoubian Building, 2006), Tabakh El-Rayess (The President's Chef, 2008), Boushkash (2008) na X-Large (2011).
